title: Clarus Viewer VR Body Systems Toolkit
description: Clarus VR Body Systems Toolkit is an Unreal Engine 5 plugin that enables you to investigate the systems of the body in VR to provide a glimpse into the features within Clarus Viewer TrainerTM.
longDescription:
Clarus VR Body Systems Toolkit is an Unreal Engine 5 plugin that enables you to investigate the systems of the body in VR.


Clarus VR Body Systems Toolkit is one of six plugins within the Educational Body Systems Toolkit that provides a glimpse into the features within Clarus Viewer TrainerTM. Clarus Viewer TrainerTM is training aid for healthcare students and instructors focused on bridging the gap between traditional book learning and patient care. The Educational Body Systems Toolkit project allows other 3D developers to create their own applications using content developed by Clarus Viewer Corporation(R).


Interact with the system control interface to toggle the visibility of systems in the human body and understand their relationships.


Summon and dismiss the interactable human knee model and 3D panels with VR controller gestures.


Grab, scale, and rotate the interactable human knee model.


Demo level provided as seen in images.


Documentation is provided throughout Blueprint comments.  


This plugin requires the following plugins in order to function:

Clarus Viewer Base

Clarus Viewer Extended

Clarus Viewer Tools
technicalDetails:
Features:

·      Investigate a realistic 3D model of a knee separated by systems of the human body including the skin, muscles & tendons, bones & ligaments, circulatory/nervous systems

·      Use 3D system control panel to toggle visibility of body systems

·      Watch panels and knee gently reset to their workstation placement when its time to clean up

·      Grab workstation handle to set table height for comfortable standing or sitting in VR

·      Toggle visibility of workstation panels and elements with 3D buttons

·      Create custom 3D buttons and UI using panel and button systems

·      Demo level with systems ready to play

·      Use as a template for UI set up in VR

·      Use as a template for educational medical training simulations in VR

Code Module(s): EducationalBodySystemsToolkit [Runtime]

Number of Blueprints: 25

Number of C++ Classes: 5

Input: Vive, Index, Oculus

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No

Documentation: https://www.clarusviewer.com/index.php/advancing-education/

Important/Additional Notes:
